description: The slaves are here to serve the House, but not always through basic service. Today they are serving as entertainment for the guests. Stefanos takes turns playing with the slaves, and eventually makes them put on a a sexual display for our guests. One of our slaves, o, has never been fisted, and kaos makes a valiant attempt, but does not succeed. Later, tramp is put on a table and brutally fucked by kaos, while Stefanos punishes her. She squirts all over the table once allowed to have the final orgasm of the day.
title: Stefanos' Brunch
